DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Other Assistance Used to Quit or Stay Off Smoking Cigarettes Since First Told You Had Cancer Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the other assistance, not previously mentioned or specified, they have used to quit or to stay off smoking cigarettes since they were first told they had cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Other Assistance Used to Quit or Stay Off Smoking Cigarettes Since Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about the use of assistance not previously mentioned or specified that an individual has used to quit or stay off smoking cigarettes since they were first told they had cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: What other assistance have yo
ReferenceDocuments.description: What other assistance have you used to quit (or to stay off) smoking cigarettes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
